question.title: What is the primary indication for hospitalisation in cases of open or non-consensual care?

option_a.title: Open or non-consensual care is a form of psychological abuse.

option_b.title: The patient must be informed about the terms and conditions of their care.

option_c.title: A 'personalised safety plan' is drawn up with the patient.

option_d.title: The patient must be treated with decompensated psychiatric disorders.

correct_option.title: A 'personalised safety plan' is drawn up with the patient.
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
